snippet: While Gov. Rick Perry of Texas has been traveling to promote himself and his state, a criminal inquiry continues into his handling of a district attorney’s drunken driving arrest and the financing for a public corruption unit under her control.
abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry has been traveling to promote himself and his state, as he considers another run for president in 2016; however, criminal inquiry continues into his handling of local District Attorney Rosemary Lehmberg’s drunken driving arrest and financing for a public corruption unit under her control.
lead_paragraph: While Gov. Rick Perry of Texas has been traveling to promote himself and his state, a criminal inquiry continues into his handling of a district attorney’s drunken driving arrest and the financing for a public corruption unit under her control.

headline.main: With Eyes on 2016, Perry Is Mired in the Past
headline.print_headline: With Eyes on 2016, Perry Mired in Past
